subject: Football
Hoaxes
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: In front of more than 200 reporters and dozens of television cameras, Manti Te’o explained the dark days that had just passed him involving a hoax about a nonexistent girlfriend.
snippet: In front of more than 200 reporters and dozens of television cameras, Manti Te’o explained the dark days that had just passed him involving a hoax about a nonexistent girlfriend.
